title: anime raven pro 1.0
description:
his is the no-ads version of Anime Raven player.
Watch free anime video streams on your phones and tablets in 720p and 1080p. Our library and anime aggregation platform services over 4000+ titles and growing!
What this app features:
- Has anime, subs and dubs that Crunchyroll does not have
- Subtitles are in English
- Dubs are in English
- Selectable video quality preferences: 360p, 480p, 720p, 1080p (~15% of all anime are in 1080p)
- Daily updates
- Intelligent search
- Library is categorized by: Popularity, Romance, Action, Fantasy, etc
- Super fast global video streaming speeds
- Optimized for both phones and tablets that run on Android 4.0 and above
- We have the latest anime episodes, OVAs, and movies from the current season and earlier
- All subtitles from your favorite sub groups
